title: Is eating Octopus, Squid or all Seafood halal to eat? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: say can we eat octopus is it halal ah okay i will answer inshallah so eating octopus is halal i'm not asking i'm stating eating octopus is halal full stop all creatures that live in water are halal to us unless they are toxic or uh harmful so everything that lives in the water is permitted for us to eat including squid as they call it or octopus
